mapper.select: select u_id, username, pwd, u_name, u_tel, u_email, v_id, u_date, u_birth, u_sex, u_status, test1, test2 from users where u_id = #{uId}
mapper.insert: insert into users(username, pwd, u_name, u_tel, u_email, v_id, u_date, u_birth, u_sex, u_status, test1, test2) values (#{username}, #{pwd}, #{uName}, #{uTel}, #{uEmail}, #{vId}, #{uDate}, #{uBirth}, #{uSex}, #{uStatus}, #{test1}, #{test2})

insert into users(username, pwd, u_name, u_tel, u_email, v_id, u_date, u_birth, u_sex, u_status, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.pwd}, #{entity.uName}, #{entity.uTel}, #{entity.uEmail}, #{entity.vId}, #{entity.uDate}, #{entity.uBirth}, #{entity.uSex}, #{entity.uStatus}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})

insert into users(username, pwd, u_name, u_tel, u_email, v_id, u_date, u_birth, u_sex, u_status, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.pwd}, #{entity.uName}, #{entity.uTel}, #{entity.uEmail}, #{entity.vId}, #{entity.uDate}, #{entity.uBirth}, #{entity.uSex}, #{entity.uStatus}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), pwd = values(pwd), u_name = values(u_name), u_tel = values(u_tel), u_email = values(u_email), v_id = values(v_id), u_date = values(u_date), u_birth = values(u_birth), u_sex = values(u_sex), u_status = values(u_status), test1 = values(test1), test2 = values(test2)
mapper.update:
update users
username = #{username},
pwd = #{pwd},
u_name = #{uName},
u_tel = #{uTel},
u_email = #{uEmail},
v_id = #{vId},
u_date = #{uDate},
u_birth = #{uBirth},
u_sex = #{uSex},
u_status = #{uStatus},
test1 = #{test1},
test2 = #{test2},
where u_id = #{uId}
